room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Evansville in Evansville
review: Sam was a great team leader. We had a wonderful first experience.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Evansville in Evansville
review: Our group had a lot of fun in the hostage room. since we had small kids we did not want scary and the game master Molleigh was great with the kids during the handcuff blindfold part. we will be back

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Evansville in Evansville
review: Had a lot of fun doing Hostage. We plan on going back for Museum Heist in the future. Staff was good about providing instructions and not telling us more than we needed to know.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Evansville in Evansville
review: My fiance and I went with 2 friends. We did the hostage room and we had an absolute blast. It really gets you on your toes! We will certainly be returning!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Evansville in Evansville
review: Went to Breakout for me and my friend's birthday. We did the hostage room and had an absolute blast. Even though it was just me, him, my fiance√© and his wife, it was just as much fun as having a big group. We escaped and actually really had to work for it!! We will definitely be back for another room!!! I recommend this to anyone who wants a night of fun and something different.
